description:
GPS Waypoints Navigator allows you to permanently store & manage your waypoints, and provides you with the tools to navigate back to them!

Save your current position as a waypoint or use the coordinate module to enter the coordinates of any position on the globe.

Navigation tools include 2 compasses- A GPS Controlled Directional Compass & a Waypoint-Finding Compass and reporting for Latitude, Longitude, Altitude, Delta Altitude, Heading, Distance to Waypoint and Total Distance Traveled.  

The waypoint-finding compass will always point to your waypoint.   

A Satellite Signal Transmission Rate Interpreter is dynamically linked to your speed to reduce the effect of location uncertainty on odometer readings.  Continuous Tracking and a power-saving Non-Continuous Tracking mode are available.  Non-Continuous Tracking is useful when you are navigating with relatively few turns.  

Does not require internet or phone service! This is a great app for use just about anywhere!
versionNote: Now includes option to prevent screen from dimming.
